Певый биошок был шедеврален, бэто было нечто новое. Второй биошок попытался повторить, вытянул только на фанатах и ожиданиях. В Инфинити есть большой минус, это жадность издателя, попытка заработать еще денег на громком имени, при минимуме вложений. Очень огорчает отсутствие русской локализации (в первых двух она была), субтитры отвлекают. В итоге не затянул, бросил так и не пройдя.

«- Букер, ты боишься Бога?
- Нет, но тебя боюсь.
- А боишься Пророка?
- Нет, с ним я разберусь».

cool

Infinite is far from his predecessor into the Bioshock saga in both technical and visual way, but still is a funny and entertaining game. 
It's cool, not scary at all, fairly challenging and full of plot twists.

I recommend it, but be sure it is as underpriced as possible: I bought it at full price and sort of regretted it.

Awesome, just awesome.
Burial at Sea is a must to get, as those two episodes really finish off the whole Bioshock storyline.
Things come full circle, and quite a few questions are answered.

This was one of the most amazing game i played!
The story was great and gameplay never once felt stale, the scenery was beautiful. 
Although encountering a few bugs like the hint arrow bringing me to one spot where nothing progressed the story, it was still an enjoyable experience.
Greatness... Played the last half of this game in one long strecth. I love fps games and the story in this one made it my skipping dinner more than worth it. Still trying to comprehend that ending.

Игра очень крутая!Много крутого оружия,теплый графон,интересный сюжет и месилово!к тому же,здесь есть типо заклинаний.например,можно наслать на врага ворон и смотреть,как весело они вырывают из него куски мяса!10 кусков мяса из 10

Je recommande ce jeu mais si je devais y mettre une note globale se serait 6/10 ou 5.5/10.

Il est graphiquement beau, le système de plasmide/arme fonctionne très bien, il y a un bon équilibre global.

Ce que j'aime moins par rapport aux autres jeux de la même série c'est l'impossibilité de sauvegarder sois-même, si on doit faire autre chose, on est obligé de reprendre sur un point de sauvegarde automatique, donc de terminer une zone ou de mourir. Les zones sont plus petites et on a beaucoup moins de liberté d'action.

Globalement le lore est bien construit mais reste très difficile à comprendre. Même en ayant terminé plusieurs fois le jeu je reste sur ma faim car tout n'est pas clair.  Je ne vais pas spoiler la fin, mais disons quand même qu'on nage en pleine science fiction, car le lore fait une très grande utilisation de divers aspect de la physique quantique qui restent à prouver à notre époque. Je ne vais pas développer pour ne pas spoiler le jeu.

Ce qui m'a vraiment déplu c'est le coté raciste, on pourrait croire en une critique, mais finalement les blancs sont racistes envers les noirs enfin envers tout ceux qui ne sont pas blancs ou qui ont des idées progressistes, les noirs sont racistes envers tout ceux qui ne sont pas noir, le seul couple chinois du jeu se fait malmener par les deux factions. Et comme le joueur est blanc, les noirs le prennent comme ami quand ça les arrangent et le pourchassent tout le reste du temps.

Si la condition des noirs est mise sur le tapis dans bioschok 2, elle n'est que le reflet de ce qui se passait aux USA à la même période, c'est un état de fait et une dénonciation de cet état.

Finalement Bioschok infinite est un bon fps à prendre au premier degré, mais il ne faut surtout pas s'attarder au lore sinon on risque de se perdre dans des problèmes méthaphysiques insolubles. Si quelqu'un a réellement compris la fin qu'il me contacte pour me l'expliquer.

Bioshock serisini Steam kullanmaya başlamadan önce bitirmiştim. Sadece Burial At Sea ek paketlerini oynamamıştım. Onları da oynadıktan sonra gönül rahatlığıyla şimdiye dek oynadığım en iyi seri diyebilirim. 
Görsel dizaynı, oynanış, senaryo, kurgu. Tam anlamıyla efsane bir hikaye anlatımı. Mekan tasarımları aşılması zor bir eşik adeta. Bunları sadece Infinite için değil tüm seri için söylüyorum. Infinite'i farklı kılan DLClerle birlikte tüm konuyu bir araya toplayıp mantıklı bir düzleme yerleştirmesi diyebilirim. 
Shooter elementleri safkan FPS oyunlarına göre biraz yumuşak kalsa da kesinlikle zevkli çatışmalar sunan, oyuncunun keşif arzusunu kamçılayan mekanlara sahip, kafa açacak bir senaryoyla alıp götüren, her yanında Ken Levine'in dehasını gördüğümüz üst düzey bir klasik Bioshock Infinite.
Oyun oynamayı seven herkese tavsiye edeceğim bir oyun.

-Türkçe çevirisi yok diye biliyorum, bu sebeple hikayeden tat almak için orta seviye bir ingilizce gerekecektir.

(finds strange bottle) takes a sip* "AAAGUAHGAHAGH!!!!!" hands begin to melt away.

10/10

Игра - шедевр. Прошел ее вначале на ps3, затем на пк (пиратка), а после выхода русской озвучки перепрошел ее еще раз но уже с стим версии.

+ Beautiful scenery.
+ Looks good even on low settings.
+ Companion is actually useful.
+ Interesting story.
+ Voice acting was pretty good!
+ Having the citizens of Columbia (and enemies) talking to each other during gameplay really made the world feel populated. Even in areas where you were fighting, you heard the enemies talking to each other, or heard Elizabeth tell Booker that she was looking to get him help, etc.
+ Throwback to Rapture -  a nice touch for those who've played the Bioshock series before!
+ Vigors felt a lot more useful in this game versus the Plasmids in the previous games.

- I thought that the combat system was repetitive. Every fight felt exactly the same as the last, save for a boss or two.

That's pretty much it for the negatives on my part. Loved this game.
Absolurtely phenominal. Best Bioshock by far. Its was fun to play and kept me guessing the whole time.

This game looks great and controls great. Its not as difficult as the others and like them can be beaten in about 10 hours. Thats due to the replay value of the game. Good, evil or anything in the middle. The story directly responds to your choices and you can't master every skill on a single playthough. 9/10

Pros - 

Great first person shooter. Good story, intense battles, unique combat system. Perfect length, good pacing, Wide variety of weapons and magic. Large areas to explore, with hidden stashes and items. Elizabeth is a helpful companion.

Cons - 

Combat can get a little repetative. Bosses are a little underwhelming. Some gear is useless. Guns are unbalanced.

Recommended? Hell yea, this game is a classic, and still worth playing 2 years after release. If you like FPS's with a good story, get it.

Sehr sehr sehr sehr guter Shooter mit cooler Story. Das Spiel passt zwar nicht so gut in die Story wie der zweite teil, jedoch ist die Grafik atemberaubend und auch das Setting weiß zu prahlen und zu gefallen. Mir gefiel das Spiel von oben bis unten.
Klare Kaufempfehlung 10/10

Bioshock Infinite ist einfach ein sehr interessantes, Actiongeladenes und auch heftiges Spiel, mit einer sehr guten Story zum nachdenken. Bioshock ist auch ein sehr schweres Spiel, egal auf welchem Schwierigkeitsmodus man seine Zeit verbringt, kann es einen schon zwischenzeitig an seine grenzen bringen. Die Grafik ist atemberaubend, selbst auf niedriger Qualität, doch die Leistung wird wenig beeinträchtigt durch die detaillierten Landschaften. Mir persönlich hat das Spiel sehr gut gefallen und bei 7 Stunden Kampagne ist es ein lohnenswertes Spiel. Ein kleines Feature das mir auch noch gefiel: Die Unterwasser-Stadt Rapture aus den anderen Bioshock Teilen wurde noch zusätzlich in die Story eingebaut, was dieses Spiel nicht zu einem komplett anderem Spiel, als die anderen Teile der Serie macht.
packende Story über den Wolken. Überaschendes Ende.

Ich habe das Spiel vor kurzem beendet, und ich mus sagen ... es ist grandios.
Die die Umgebung ist extrem gut gestalltet, die Story ist spannend und lässt einen nicht loß.
Ich finde die wiederspieglung politischer Konflikte ist ebenfalls gut gelungen. Aufgrund des mitreißenden Endes (ich kann sowas leider nicht haben also persönlicher Punkt abzug) gebe ich Bioshock Infinite 9,5/10. Ich würde mir erhoffen, dass es eine Weiterführung der Serie gibt , aber vllt diesmal nicht in Rapture oder Columbia :) BIOSHOCK 4 ist für mich das neue Halflife 3 :D

Danke an Irrational Games für dieses tolle Spiel.

Wow. 
This is one of the most engrosing games i have ever played. 
The original half life has long lived in my heart as the ultimate close pathed FPS game. But the original bio shock really shoock that with more tactical combat and a far deeper story.
Infinite throws you into the clouds and much like rapture is something to behold. Its prettier than the original and the views and scenery are incredible. 
But what really got me was the story and volume in each character. And thats why i would recomend this game 100%, its deep, touching and did i not see that ending coming! 
But... its not all glory. The combat and movment is all a bit ropey compared to genre leaders. Even the original felt much more involved, largely due to its resource and vulnerability differences. In infinite you pretty much pick up a carbine and run round stunning and killing things. You know when fights are going to occur and never feel threatened by them. Not once did i feel the need to play combat clever. The original i spent longer casing out areas and setting traps than actually fighting!

As a story and visual feast this is an amazing game, and gets a high mark from me. Its just a shame that even tho the combat may be as it is, they couldnt of made it as involved and tricky as the first game.

the best ever I've ever played, 
I enjoyed this game more than any game I've ever played in my life.
In this game I meet Elizabeth,
And she is the most human, kind, nice, intelligent character I have ever seen and knew in my life.
Even though it only character in the game, I just fall in love with her. and I can not ever forget her.
This game changed my perspective of life, Time and the World forever.

I Am Very Very Very Very Very highly recommend this game.
It has changed my life Forever, I'm sure it will change your too!

Irrational Games и её отец основатель Кен Левин  создали по настоящему революционный атмосферный шутер вышедший в далеком 2007 году под названием Bioshock наделавший много шума в игровой индустрии. после чего в 2010 выходит вторая часть которую создавала другая компания и не произвела особого впечатления на фанатов первой части но все равно заслужила одобрения критиков и наконец в 2013 году выходит долгожданное продолжение заслуженно получившее звание игры года и еще 75 наград на конференции E3. сожалею что сразу не купил коллекционное издание т.к такие захватывающие игры с глубокой сюжетной линией выходящей за рамки *обычного шутера выходят далеко не каждый год
[b]Крайне крайне рекомендую этот : замечательный потрясающий завораживающий  головокружительный превосходный ошеломляющий и малую толику трагичный Шедевр [/b]
После прохождения остальные игры начинают казаться пресными скучными.

Bioshock is a game that influenced games upon games of the future. It's very much a masterpiece of modern gaming. However, if there was one thing I could change about it, it would be the ability to start again with all weapons accessible. Starting early with things like the vox hail fire or vigors like return to sender could make for some interesting gameplay early on. It feels as though time with that equipment was too short lived. In short, however, it's a game I hope to keep playing.
It's good, buy it

First Bioshock game, and definitely hooked now. The story was amazing. The graphics were great. The gunplay near the end of the campaign on Hard Mode was kinda stupid with the bosses and fights. The sky-hook has a bug in it which makes forced camera lock until the animation finishes when jumping. 9/10 just because of the stupid-ness of the bossfights later on and the skyhook bug.

BioShock Infinite, is one of a kind. Not only is it's graphics amazing, but the story is so complex and in depth. The characters are memorable, and extremely well created. There was not a single moment in this piece of art that ever made me bored or tired of playing the game. I rate this game a solid 10/10 without hesitation.

Ho giocato questo titolo lo scorso anno: un mio amico mi ha gentilmente prestato la sua copia fisica, e l'ho letteralmente divorato. Questo è stato il gioco che mi ha spinto ad acquistare l'intera trilogia di BioShock. I primi due sono decisamente sopravvalutati a mio parere ma per descrivere questo ultimo capitolo non ci sono parole:

+ Ambientazioni spettaccolari: c'è poco da fare, le ambientazioni di Columbia sono molto più belle rispetto a quelle di Rapture, almeno per quanto riguarda il mio gusto personale. L'engine grafico fa un ottimo lavoro e vi è uno studio delle luci non indifferente.

+ Non si può parlare di BioShock, se non si parla della sua trama, che è completamente slegata dai due precedenti capitoli. Sempre a mio parere, la storia è molto più coinvolgente e intrigante: anche i personaggi sono meglio caratterizzati.

+ Finalmente le meccaniche di gioco sono state migliorate. Almeno qui possiamo sparare senza avere la costante paura di terminare le munizioni a nostra dispozione. Questo da all'opera un aspetto più action e meno "survival", ma io l'ho preferisco così un FPS, tuttavia potrebbe far storcere il naso ad alcuni fan di vecchia data. Migliorata anche l'accellerazione del mouse.

+ Il gameplay è molto ricco e vario e finalmente gli sviluppatori sono riusciti a realizzare delle missioni più varie e divertenti.

COMMENTO FINALE: BioShock Infinte è l'unico gioco della trilogia che mi sento di consigliare a scatola chiusa. Questo titolo stravolge completamente l'intera struttura dei due capitoli precedenti: è meglio variare, piuttosto che presentare al pubblico sempre la stessa cosa. Il team di sviluppo ha fatto un ottimo lavoro. Se volete godervi un titolo diverso con una trama realmente originale e diversa dalle centinaia e centinaia di giochi tutti uguali che stanno uscendo in questo momento, non perdete tempo: acquistate subito questo capolavoro.

Hace bien poquito que me compre la trilogía y como soy asín de burro, empece la casa por el tejado y me puse a jugar directamente a la tercera parte """ luego me di cuenta que da igual como las juegues, puesto que son historias diferentes que no penden de continuación alguna """, que puedo decir malo de este juego, pues con la hora y pico que llevo jugado poco, pero la verdad que me esta gustando todo, control preciso, gráficos muy currados, escenarios mu bonicos, doblaje MUY BUENO, en comparación con otros shooters como ... cof cof ... cod, resumiendo, un juego en el que se ve que le han puesto mucho amor HACIA EL USUARIO FINAL,como tiene que ser.

Wirklich gutes Spiel. Schöne Story die gewohnt ihre Haken schlägt wobei diese ganze Paralleluniversum-geschichte gewöhnungsbedürftig ist. Am meisten gefällt mir die Bindung der beiden Hauptprotagonisten. Leider und das ist der Größte Kirtikpunkt bekommt man keine nennenswerten Infos wie und warum es diese Fähigkeiten gibt, noch ausreichend und gut erzählten content zum backround. Leider finde ich auch das Upgradesystem schlecht, wenn man sich Bioschock 2 anschaut wo deutlich mehr Liebe und kniff reingesteckt wurde (beispiel das man jedes upgrade an der Waffe auch optisch sieht) ist schade.
Kurz um klasse Spiel für neueinsteiger und für fans nen must have

This game... holy shitballs batman. Graphically amazing, the art style and visuals through the game are beautiful. Found myself wanting to explore this world. Through your time in the game you watch a happy carnival like flying city turn into a post apocalyptic nightmare. The game play is fun, great combat with vigor and flying hooks to the face. The ending is great to, some people hate it but I enjoyed it and will probably be playing through again.
This is truly ingenious game. It is thematically compelling. The landscapes are beautiful, enthralling and at times - terrifying. I highly recommend this game.

想了很久后来还是决定去写这个评论。我不是一个热衷于fps游戏的玩家，生化奇兵是我单机通关的第一个fps。因为fps经验不多也不好说游戏操作体验怎么样，但是我知道的是吸引我一直玩下去的不只有剧情，还有一环套一环的伏笔（I'm not afraid of god, but i'm afraid of you.
+世界设定，隐约和前作的联系，需要玩家自己发掘的平行世界设定
+蒸汽朋克
+无数的伏笔，之前看起来并不重要的对话到游戏最后都有一种恍然大悟的感觉
+平行世界设定（最重要的是游戏把设定解释的很清楚）
+各种悬念，真的能吸引人一直玩下去
+历史背景，游戏中贯穿的讽刺性元素和当时的艺术风格的体现

一些不是特别完美的地方（可能也有点鸡蛋里挑骨头了……
-boss战太平淡，虽然继续多说就会剧透，但是boss战平淡毕竟是欧美游戏的通病……
-有些地图很绕，有点类似老滚4的感觉，进了地图还要原路绕回去还有[spoiler]林先生的[/spoiler]任务，虽然很好的解释了背景，但是方式有点生硬
-有些设定方面（不知道是不是没有收集到录音带），有些细节让人没有太多的成就感[spoiler]比方说从将军那里辛苦拿到的能力在后期游戏中反复成箱的出现[/spoiler]
评论区第一个评论写的跟我通关的感觉完全一模一样，在游戏过程中大概有什么要发生的预感，但是最后这个游戏亲口告诉我的时候整个人都心塞的要死。
（PS.建议看完整个制作人员名单，最后的歌响起的时候真的是升华了整个游戏
If you could play only 10 games in your life this game still should be on your list - and somewhere on top, at that.
Gördüğüm en tahmin edilemez ve en mükemmel sona sahip olan oyun diyebilirim mutlaka alın ve kacırmayın

Hoy me pase el juego entero en una tarde xd y la verdad que esta muy bueno

No creo que haga falta explicar de que trata porque ya lo explicaron en tooodas las otras reseñas y es probable que nadie vea esta pero aun así quiero dar mi opinión respecto a este juego

Lo amé, con todo mi corazón. Me compre la colección de los bioshock y no me termino de convencer la ambientación de los primeros por lo que no los termine pero en este hicieron un cambio GENIAL al pasar de una ciudad oscura y triste como lo era rapture a una muy alegre y colorida como lo es columbia

Elizabeth es simplemente... el mejor personaje secundario que vi en un videojuego hasta el momento, te provee de munición, botiquines, armas, e incluso abrir cerraduras, aparte que hace que logres tomarle mucho afecto y el poco tiempo que pasas sin su compañía al final te das cuenta de lo mucho que afecta al gameplay 

La jugabilidad es bastante simple, es avanzar del punto A al punto B derrotando oleadas de enemigos con ayuda de todo tipo de armas y poderes llamados plasmidos los cuales pueden ser desde quemar a tus enemigos hasta controlar maquinas, los cuales la verdad que me encantaban hasta que llegue al final y parece como si los ultimos plasmidos que te dan fueran para rellenar porque la verdad no les vi mucha utilidad

Pero lo que hace que este juego brille y me parezca una maravilla es su historia, la cual posee un plot twist simplemente maravilloso y bastante inesperado, ademas, hace que ir del punto A al punto B nunca resulte aburrido ya que a medida que pasa el tiempo te van explicando muyyyy lentamente de los personajes y la situación que esta pasando rapture, hasta el final en el cual de golpe te explican todo de golpe y te das cuenta de que todo tiene sentido y todo tenia una razón de estar ahi

Y la banda sonora y los efectos de sonido son la cereza del pastel, haciendo que te sientas parte de la historia 

UNA MARAVILLA POR LA QUE VALE COMPLETAMENTE LA PENA PAGAR 
10/10
No hay palabras para describir está obra maestra.Muy buenos personajes, historia, música.
